page.title: 12INDUSTRY
page.content: {COULTER ELECTRONICS} Coulter Electronics is situated in Marsh Farm, which is very unusual because this is a housing area.It is the only industry in Marsh Farm. Coulter Electronics moved into the purpose built factory several years ago from Harpenden because they needed more room. They manufacture specialist hospital equipment to do with Haematology. The company employs approximately five hundred workers in this very modern fctory. The products are distributed throughout the British Isles and the rest of the world.
